attributes.action: pledge that no further extension of party funding by the tax payer will be enacted without being endorsed by a national popular referendum which will also debate and decide upon alternatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent spate of scandals over funding of the Westminister parties, this petition seeks to protect the tax payer by making it mandatory for a public referendum to be held before any new arrangements which further commits taxpayer monies to the parties can be enacted. The petition seeks to give maximum leeway for the taxpayer to debate and decide upon funding alternatives.
